definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
just as in the past (idiom); as before/continuing as always
to forget and not bear recriminations (idiom); to let bygones be bygones/There is no point in crying over spilt milk.
not censure sb for his past misdeeds/overlook sb's past mistakes/let bygones be bygones

sentences.english: He is sophisticated enough to laugh things off and let bygones be bygones.
sentences.chinese: 他成熟老練，對事一笑了之，既往不咎。

sentences.english: The Sri Lankan government will as always adhere to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 斯政府將一如既往地堅持一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: The disease is not rare in clinic, but it is often misdiagnosed and patients have to be reoperated on.
sentences.chinese: 該病臨牀並非少見，但既往易被誤診而遭再次手術。

sentences.english: While gaokao fever is as strong as ever this year, criticism is mounting.
sentences.chinese: 雖然今年的高考熱一如既往，但批評聲音也越來越多。

sentences.english: eBay has consistently had one of the ugliest websites on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 易趣網依舊一如既往的醜。

sentences.english: The clinicians rigidly adhere to past history.
sentences.chinese: 醫生過於拘泥於既往史。

sentences.english: True to form, Finnie is much more interested in talking about her students.
sentences.chinese: 範尼還是一如既往地更樂意談論她的學生們。

sentences.english: As always, thanks for checking out our photo collections!
sentences.chinese: 一如既往，謝謝你觀賞我們的圖片集。

sentences.english: The aim of the Co. is to protect the brand of "Yulong" for ever.
sentences.chinese: 一如既往地維護“玉龍”品牌是公司的目標。

sentences.english: No bill of attainder or ex post facto Law shall be passed.
sentences.chinese: 不得通過公民權利剝奪法案或追溯既往的法律。

sentences.english: Patients with generalized peritonitis and a history of abdominal surgery were excluded.
sentences.chinese: 有瀰漫性腹膜炎和既往腹部手術史者除外。

sentences.english: "You have to let bygones be bygones, " says McLaughlin.
sentences.chinese: “你必須既往不咎，”麥克勞克林說。

sentences.english: The Southern Aral, however, still remains a shadow of its former self.
sentences.chinese: 然而，鹹海的南部依然一如既往。

sentences.english: However, he has consistently declined all offers.
sentences.chinese: 然而，葉峯一如既往地婉拒了這些提議。

sentences.english: All the same, I should very much have liked to be Pliny the Younger.
sentences.chinese: 但一如既往的，我非常希望成爲小普里尼。

definition: to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
